This organization has supported her since she began, through the methodology of the solidarity groups, in which she learned how to manage her loans well and the importance of paying punctually, as she has done all along.

Elba's dream is to have a very big store specializing in artisanal purses and knapsacks traditional to her native town of San Jacinto, to which she owes her artistic ability.

loans.use: to buy high-quality thread to make purses and knapsacks in large quantities.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes de 38 años de edad, convive con su pareja y fruto de ellos tienen cinco hijos en etapa escolar. Juntos residen en la localidad de Santa Rosa, ubicada en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, donde tienen su techo propio a base de madera. Mercedes empezó a trabajar como agricultora, pero con el transcurso del tiempo sus ganancias lo invirtió en otro tipo de negocio y decidió emprender junto a su pareja en la fabricación de todo tipo muebles. Pues su esposo sabia el negocio, por lo que sabia hacer lindos diseños y modelos novedosos, por el cual sus clientes se sentían satisfechos por los resultados. Por lo general trabajan desde las 9:00 de la mañana hasta las 5:00 de la tarde, y su punto de venta lo realiza en el primer piso de su casa. Mercedes acude una vez a MFP a solicitar su crédito con la finalidad de seguir progresando y prestando servicios a su comunidad. Su plan a futuro es poder ampliar su carpintería con la necesidad de almacenar e introducir nuevas maquinarias, para que de esa manera minimice tiempo y costo. Este será su noveno crédito con MFP, está muy feliz de seguir accediendo a éstos créditos y quiere agradecer a todas las personas que harán posible que obtenga el dinero que necesita. Con el monto solicitado comprará madera para seguir elabroando más muebles.
texts.en: Mercedes is 38 years old, and lives with her partner and their 5 school-aged children.  They reside in Santa Rosa, located in the beautiful Ayacuchan jungle, where they have their own wooden home.  Mercedes began working as a farmer, but as time went on, she invested her earnings in a different type of business and decided to begin working with her partner making all kinds of furniture.  Her husband already knew that business, and knew how to make pretty designs and creative new models, and for this reason their customers feel satisfied with their work.  They normally work from 9:00 am until 5:00 pm, and they sell the furniture from the first floor of their house.  Mercedes came to MFP to ask for a loan in order to keep progressing and providing services to her community.  Her future plan is to be able to expand their carpentry shop as they need to store and purchase new machinery in order to cut down on time and cost.  This is her ninth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to keep receiving these loans and she wants to thank all the people who will make it possible for her to get the money she needs.  With the requested amount she will buy wood to keep making more furniture.

loans.use: buy wood

loans.name: Hope Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Hope Group in Western Kenya! This group joined Kiva partner One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.
Jane is the facilitator of Hope Group. She is the mother of three children. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Jane had an excellent maize yield harvesting twelve bags on three-quarters of a acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Jane was only able to harvest one and a half bags of maize on three-quarters of an acre of land.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Jane and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.
With income from maize sales, Jane will repair her home, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.
In 2012, the members of Hope Group will each plant  between half and two acres of maize.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Badiya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe "Badiya" est créé le 25 Mars 2001. Le nom signifie Parentée parce que la plupart des membres habitent le même secteur de quartier. L'activité principale des membres est le commerce.
Mme Mame Diarra est la responsable du groupe, elle est debout à droite de la photo avec la main levée et un foulard sur la tête. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Elle a 15 autres personne en charge.
Mme Mame Diarra est commerçante depuis plus de 10 ans, et elle vend des chaussures, du savon, des tissus teintés, des sacs à main...
Avec ce prêt, cette dame compte élargir son activité afin de satisfaire l'ensemble de sa clientèle.
Les bénéfices sont destinés à prendre bien en charge sa famille, augmenter son épargne et préparer l'avenir de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The 'Badiya' group was created on March 25th, 2001.  The group's name means 'Connections' because most of its members live in the same neighborhood.  The main business activity of the group's members is commerce.

Mame Diarra is the leader of the group.  She is standing on the right of the photo with her hand raised and is wearing a headscarf.  She is married and has three children.  She is responsible for 15 other people.

Mame Diasse has been a retailer for more than ten years.  She sells shoes, soap, dyed fabrics, purses (handbags)...  With her loan, this lady plans to expand her business so that she can satisfy her customers.  Her profits will be used to take good care of her family, increase her savings and prepare for her children's future.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to sell

loans.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es:
Cruz de 42 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de La Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola y ganadera.

Cruz tiene como actividad laboral la confección de prendas de vestir y el servicio de costura, desde hace 5 años, su negocio lo tiene en su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 1200 para comprar material y una máquina remayadora, para seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ganancias para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Cruz con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio adelante, con el ideal de brindarle otras oportunidades en la vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cruz Maria is 42 years old. She lives with her children in her own house, with only electricity service, located in the district of La Matanza that belongs to the department of Piura. This area is known for agriculture and livestock.

Cruz Maria has been in the business of making clothing, working as a seamstress for the last 5 years, from her own house. She has an established clientele and also takes orders. She does not have much competition in this line of work. With the profit that she makes she can cover the basic necessities for her family.

She is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1200 soles in order to buy supplies and a darning-overlocker sewing machine in order to continue providing good service and to complete the orders which she has. This will permit her to have better earnings in order to improve her quality of life for her family. Cruz Maria works hard and puts in effort to secure a good business future with the dream of giving her family more opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy supplies and a darning-overlocker sewing machine in order to continue making clothing

loans.name: Deggo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe deggo est créé le 25 Mars 2001. Le nom "Deggo" signifie entente.
Mme Khady est la responsable du groupe. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec la main levée. Elle est mariée et elle a 08 enfants en charge, dont certains sont des enfants de sa coépouse.
Mme Khady fait un commerce de détails au marché de sa localité. Elle possède un étal au marché et vend des légumes, du citron et de l'huile de palme.
Avec ce crédit, cette dame va acheter des marchandises pour les revendre en détails.
Les bénéfices générés vont permettre à cette brave dame d'aider son mari pour la scolarité des enfants, et aussi d'augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
Deggo Group (harmony) was created on March 25, 2001.

Mrs Khady, standing on the right side of the photo and raising her hand, chairs the group. She is married and has eight children in her care. Some of the children are those of her cowife. Mrs Khady sells grocery products at the market of her village. She has a market stall, where she sells vegetables, lemons and palm oil. She will use her loan to buy groceries for resale. The profit from the activity will enable this brave lady to help her husband to provide education to the children, and also to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy various groceries for resale at the local market.

loans.name: Matore Women Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Matore Women Group in Western Kenya! This group joined Kiva partner One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.
Beatrice is the facilitator of the group. She has eight children at home to take care of. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds, ensure food security for her family and educate her children. In the recent 2011 season, Beatrice had an excellent maize yield harvesting 22 bags on 1 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, she was only able to harvest 5 bags of maize on 1 acre of land.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Beatrice and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.
With income from maize sales, Beatrice will educate her children, ensure food security and pay her loan.
In 2012, the members of Matore Women Group will each plant between half and 1 acre of maize.
Beatrice is pictured with her group members in the photograph.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es:
Doña Luisa, sigue incrementando la venta de sus productos plasticos, el cual sigue elaborando junto a su esposo, y que durante muchos años, han captado su clientela en los mercados capitalino. Son productos accesibles por su precio, y que el ochenta por ciento de los Nicaraguenses compramos los platos plasticos, taza de tomar café, de tomar sopa, baldes grandes, pequeños, siendo de bajos costos y de alta duracion.
Su vivienda la han ido construyendo con ahorros y financiamiento que han hecho en Afodenic, en donde han avanzado mucho en las mejoras, asi como el aumento de su negocio.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo sera para repellar paredes internas de los cuartos, mejorar techo, ya que se lo dejaron mal hecho el trabajo, y que podra dar a mejorar para el bienestar familiar.
texts.en:
Luisa Amanda has continued to increase the sale of plastic items, which she does along with her husband. For years, they have gathered clientele from markets. The products are well-priced, and 80% of Nicaraguans buy plastic plates, coffee cups, soup bowls, and large and small buckets, since they are cheap and last a long time. 

Luisa has been building her house with savings and financing that she has received from AFODENIC. She has been able to make many improvements, similar to the improvements with her business.

Today with this new loan she will be able to plaster the walls in her home, improve the roof (since it was very poorly installed), which will improve the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to make improvements to the rooms in her house as well as the roof.

loans.name: Cesar Antonio

texts.es:
Don Cesar sigue ofreciendo sus ricas fritanga, que hace cada dia , el cual junto  a su esposa dan el servicio a sus clientes.
Gracias a los financiamiento se han logrado las mejoras a su local, siendo de gran atracion e higiene en su negocio. Lo que quiere hacer es la construcin de baño de dama y caballero en el local del negocio, siendo de gran pioridad, ya que la mas veces ha prestado el personal. 
Y que siendo de gran necesidad para sus clientes hara la compra de lavamanos, inodoro, urinaR., puertas, bloques y comenzar la construccion. El cual prestara las condiciones de servicios de un comedor.
texts.en:
Cesar has a "fritanga" business (selling fried foods) that he works at every day.  His wife works with him, providing service to their customers.  Thanks to the loans that he has obtained, he has been able to make some improvements to his place of business, making it more attractive and hygienic.  What he wants to do now is to add a men's and women's bathroom to his eatery.  This is his first priority, since at times he has to lend customers his personal bathroom.  

To provide this necessity for his customers, he will buy sinks, toilets, urinals, doors, and cement blocks to begin the construction.  In this way he will able to provide the services of a restaurant.

loans.use: to build a men's and women's bathroom in his place of business to provide better service to his customers by satisfying this need

loans.name: Vitaliana

texts.es: Vitaliana, natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa de 44 años, es una mujer trabajadora vive en su propia casa rodeado de sus 04 queridos hijos a quienes le inculca que el estudio es la mejor herencia que las puede otorgar. Vitaliana tuvo que sobresalir sin resignaciones ante la perdida de su amado esposo, cuenta que los primeros años fueron difícil pero con el tiempo lo superó y ahora se dedica a su trabajo, en sus cultivos de cacao, café y árboles frutales, plantas originarias de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Vitaliana sabe que sus ingresos dependen de la calidad de sus plantas, las cuales tiene que cuidarlas muy bien y menciona que la clave de su éxito radica en la perseverancia y las ganas de trabajar, asimismo sus plantas están trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitación sobre el manejo de poda y control de la plagas de insectos  que hacen de su producto el mejor. Ella normalmente trabaja por cuenta propia pero los fines de semana recibe el apoyo de sus hijos, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, de esa manera avance con mayor celeridad en la extracción y selección de su producto. Su plan a futuro es seguir trabajando con la misma perseverancia que la caracteriza y así salir adelante junto a sus hijos. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y trabaja sin causar problemas a la entidad financiera y a su banco comunal, por tanto espera contar con el apoyo de ustedes. Con el crédito solicitado comprará sacos de abono y fertilizantes para mejorar la calidad de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Vitaliana is originally from the city of Santa Rosa. She is 44 years old and is a hard working women who lives in her own house surrounded by her 4 dear children whom she has influenced with the idea that education is the best legacy that can be given. 

Vitaliana had to survive without giving up when she lost her beloved husband. She tells us that the first years were difficult but with time she put it behind her and now she dedicates herself to the work of growing cacao, coffee, fruit trees, and plants from the jungle area of Valle Rio Apurimac. 

Vitaliana knows that her income depends on the quality of her plants, which she cares for with devotion and she mentions that the key to her success comes from her perseverance and willingness to work.  Also, she mentions that she goes about her work in a scientific way because she receives training about how to go about pruning and about pest control that has improved her crops. 

She normally works alone but on the weekends she has the help of her children and during harvest season she hires laborers and in this way the harvesting of her crop is done quicker. She plans to continue working with the same perseverance that she is known for and thus to give her children a better future. 

This is her third loan with MFP. She has been very punctual in the payment of her past loan and she works without causing any problems for the communal bank and therefore she is looking forward to your help. She plans to use this loan to buy bags of compost and fertilizer in order to care for her crops.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer

loans.name: Njete Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Njete Group in Western Kenya! This group has some very experienced One Acre Fund farmers, who joined One Acre Fund in 2008. They have remained with One Acre Fund since that time – re-enrolling each year to access the new products and services that One Acre Fund offers. In the 2012 program, these farmers will benefit from a new health product, a new maize storage product, and new insurance products. As in the past, One Acre Fund will deliver these products right to these farmers' village – an unparalleled farmer-friendly service in this part of Kenya.
Norah is the facilitator of the Njete Group. She takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and have additional maize profits to educate her children. In the recent 2011 season, Norah had an excellent maize yield harvesting 14 bags on half an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Norah was only able to harvest 4 bags of maize on half an acre of land.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Norah and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.
With income from maize sales, Norah will educate her children, ensure food security, and continue to build her assets on the farm, such as livestock.
In 2012, the members of Njete Group will each plant between half and one and three-quarters of an acre of maize.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Chebukumi A Shg Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Chebukumi A SHG Group in Western Kenya! This group joined Kiva partner One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.
Nancy is the facilitator of this group. She takes care of eight children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Nancy had a very good maize yield harvesting 20 bags on 1.5 acres of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Nancy was only able to harvest 5 bags of maize on 1.5 acres of land.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Nancy and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.
With income from maize sales, Nancy will educate her children and invest in livestock rearing.
In 2012, the members of Chebukumi A SHG Group will each plant between 0.5 and 1.5 acres of maize.
In the picture above, one of the borrowers is displaying a One Acre Fund calendar (a free "extra" given out to excellent clients!).

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Silvio

texts.es:
Don Silvio lleva años desempeñandose como guarda de seguridad, tambien su esposa administra una pequeña pulperia y palmea trotillas en su casa y ah si cubrir todos los gastos.
Con el credito anterior logro comenzar un cuarto el cual no termino, y que continuara  y que espera terminar. Ya que con este credito comenzara su muro de su vivienda, ya que se han dado muchos robos en el barrio, y quiere dar mejor seguridad a su familia como  reguardar  su propiedad.
Sus cuatro hijos siguen estudiando, y que espera poder seguir apoyando para que logren mejores condiciones de oportunidad en la vida.
texts.en:
Silvio has been working as a security guard for years. His wife runs a small general store and makes tortillas to sell to help cover all their expenses.
Silvio used his previous loan to start building a bedroom for his house. It is not finished yet, but he plans to keep building and finish it. With this loan, he will start building a wall around his home, as there have been a lot of robberies in his neighborhood and he wants to keep his family safe and protect his property.
His four children are still in school, and he hopes to continue being able to support them to give them better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to build a wall to protect his property.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña Teresa, de profesion costurera y venta de ropa nueva y de segunda mano, pues sigue creciendo en inventario, ya que solo la costura no resuelve sus gastos del hogar.
Su esposo comerciante de granos basicos, y muy responsables con sus tres hijos, los dos mayores ya estan trabajando, y la menor esta cursando la universidad.
Hoy en dia, sus ventas han aumentado, al vender mas ropa, lo que con este nuevo financiamiento comprara, una paca y telas para seguir haciendo su costura, y vender su ropa nueva, manteniendo su clientela. Y que gracias  ah estos prestamo, sigue equilibrando sus ventas y sus gastos en  su pequeño negocio.
texts.en:
Teresa is a seamstress and sells new and used clothing. She continues to increase her inventory, as she can't earn enough sewing to cover her household expenses.
Her husband sells staple grains and takes good care of their three children. The two eldest children are working, and the youngest is studying in the university.
Today her earning have increased and she sells more clothing. She will use this new loan to buy clothing in bulk and fabrics to keep making new clothing for her customers. Thanks to this loan, she'll be able to balance her earnings and expenses for her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk and fabrics to keep making new clothing for her business.

loans.name: Bayardo Arsenio

texts.es:
Don Bayardo sigue con su negocio, y ventas ambulantes, de cereales y pan, cereal que el mismo elabora del rico maiz, pues al tener financiamiento logro aumentar la cantidad y variedad en sus ventas. como: venta de pinol, pinolillo, semilla de jicaro, cereal.
Con el credito anterior, logro hacer un bajatete, el cual ahora se cubre mas del sol y de la luvia, lo que esta contento por la mejora.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento comenzara la construccion de un muro, de concreto para mejor seguridad, teniendo cerrado solo con zinc, el cual espera abanzar bastante esta construccion.
texts.en:
Bayardo continues with his business as a street vendor of cereals and bread, cereal that he himself makes from delicious corn because having financing allowed him to increase the number and variety of his sales like: pinol [beverage made with toasted white corn without cocoa], pinolillo [beverage made with toasted white corn with cocoa and cinnamon], jícaro seeds and cereal. 

With the previous loan he was able to build an overhang that protects him more from the sun and rain and he’s happy about this improvement.  

Now, with this new loan he will start to build a concrete wall for more security since he currently encloses only with metal sheeting; he hopes to advance quite a bit with this construction.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Jose De La Rosa

texts.es:
José de 59 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos que pertenece  al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace varios años José se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos, golosinas), verduras y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su domicilio para su  comodidad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desee, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todas sus necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería (comestibles) para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio sea más grande y esté más surtido de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes;  con las ganancias podrá cubrir su préstamo y mejorar su calidad de vida.  José es una persona responsable, trabajadora y dedicada, con el objetivo de que su familia se supere en la vida.
texts.en:
José, 59, lives with his family in his own house that has running water and electricity and is located in Olmos District that belongs to Lambayeque Department.  This zone is noted for farming and animal husbandry.

For several years now José has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, snacks), vegetables and beverages.  He’s installed his store at home for his comfort because this way he can take care of customers at any time he wants.  He tries to use profits from the sale of his products to cover all household daily needs.

To stock his business he’s asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy larger amounts of merchandise (foodstuffs) to stock the store; his only objective is that the business be larger and with more stock available for his customers.  With the profits he will be able to repay the loan and improve his quality of life.  José is a responsible, hardworking, dedicated person with the goal of helping his family get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy larger amounts of stock merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Marcial Salvador

texts.es:
Don Marcial, sigue con su puesto de venta de zapatos en variedad para dama, hombres y niños,  su especialidad es el zapato deportivo que se vende mucho, estos zapatos los vende nuevo y de  segunda mano, pero de buena calidad. asi mismo ha introducido ropa nueva, permitiendo tener mas ingresos.
Atravez de los años, ha logrado la captacion de los clientes, por mantener buenos precios. Su esposa le apoya con la venta y tambien vende productos lacteos.
Con este nuevo financiamiento comprara  cuatro cajones de zapatos en variedad, cada caja trae doce pares, lo mas demandado por sus clientes son  adidas, nike, reeboock. Comprando calidad.
texts.en:
Marcial continues with his shoe stand selling an assortment of shoes for women, men and children.  His specialty is athletic shoes which sell very well.  He sells both new and second-hand shoes but of good quality.  He’s also started selling new clothes to earn more income.

Throughout the years he’s managed to capture customers because his prices are good.  His wife helps him with the sales and also sells dairy products.  

He will use this loan to buy four cases of assorted shoes.  Each case contains twelve pairs.  What his customers demand most are Adidas, Nike and Reebok – they buy quality.

loans.use: to buy four cases of assorted shoes.

loans.name: Sandra Azucena

texts.es: Sandra mujer trabajadora, su hijo estudiante, su compañero de vida le ayuda económicamente, se desempeña como domestica desde hace tiempo. También alquila una habitación a estudiante siendo un ingreso más. Unos de sus planes es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda. Ya que en estos tiempo de lluvia se le pasa el agua e inundo el patio  de la casa no pudiendo pasar adonde esta el servicio sanitario. Este es su primer ciclo de préstamo agradeciendo a la financiera por el apoyo a desarrollo de su nivel de vida. Con el préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedrines, bloques, lámina de zinc, perlines, compra de servicio, tubo pvc, entre otros materiales realizando cambio de zinc en la entrada de su casa y la construcción de su servicio sanitario dentro de la casa.  Obteniendo mayor seguridad y comodidad para su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra is a hardworking woman.  Her son’s a student.  Her life’s companion helps out economically.  She’s been working as a domestic employee for a long time.  She also rents a room to a student for extra income.  One of her plans is to improve her house’s infrastructure because during the rainy season water came in and flooded the patio making it impossible for people to get to the area where the toilet is located.

This is her first loan cycle and she thanks the financial institution for the support given to her to improve her standard of living.  She will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies like: cement, sand, gravel, concrete blocks, metal sheeting and purlines.  She will also buy a toilet and PVC tubing, among other materials, to replace the metal sheeting in the entrance to her house and to install a toilet inside the house thus obtaining more security and comfort for her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Matilde Rosa

texts.es:
MatilD. D. 39 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia,  cuenta con servicios sólo D. luz, ubicada en el distrito D. Morropón que pertence al departamento D. Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

MatilD. se dedica a la elaboración, venta D. chicha D. jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base D. maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú), esta actividad lo realiza desD. hace 2 años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado D. generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas D. la chicha D. jora, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  También comercializa aves D. corral, lo que le permite ayudarse con otro ingreso.

Teniendo la oportunidad D. que su negocio crezca MatilD. a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. harina D. maíz para la elaboración D. chicha D. jora y alimento balanceado para sus aves, con la finalidad D. obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y tener mejoras económicas para su familia.
texts.en:
MatilD., 39, lives with her husband and children in her own house which only has electricity and is located in Morropón District belonging to Piura Department.  All the residents in this zone are in farming, animal husbandry and crafts.

MatilD. makes “chicha D. jora” (a delicious beverage maD. from corn and consumed in northern Perú).    She’s been in this line of work for two years since it’s a custom passed down from generation to generation.  Lately, sales of chicha D. jora have increased which has led to a favorable increase in her income and improved quality of life for her family.  She also sells barnyard fowl which helps her with some additional income.

Having the opportunity for her business to grow, MatilD. has requested a 1000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy larger amounts of corn flour to make the chicha D. jora and to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her fowl hoping to earn higher profits and to increase her number of customers to repay the loan and have improved family economy.

loans.use: to buy corn flour and nutritionally balanced feed for her barnyard fowl.

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es:
Clara de 29 años, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace unos años Clara se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y de ganado ovino, su negocio lo tiene en casa de sus padres, cuenta con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga en ambas actividades podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y solventar sus gastos personales.  A sus animales los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, con la venta de sus animales podrá solventar sus necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos de belleza y alimento balanceado para sus animales y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para cubrir su crédito y mejorar económicamente.  Clara es una mujer trabajadora y dedicada que con su esfuerzo a sabido salir adelante, para seguir ayudando a su familia, en especial a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Clara, 29, is single and lives in her parents’ house which only has electricity and is located in the rural part of Tambogrande District which belongs to Piura Department.  The zone’s activities are farming, livestock raising and crafts making.

Clara has been selling beauty products and raising sheep for a few years.  Her business is located at her parents’ house.  She has her own clientele and uses income earned in both activities to have a better quality of life and to cover her personal expenses.  She feeds her animals nutritionally balanced feed and natural grasses.  Sale of her animals allows her to cover daily household expenses.

She’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more beauty products and nutritionally balanced animal feed to earn higher profits to repay the loan and improve economically.  Clara is a hard working, dedicated woman who has known how to get ahead through her own efforts to continue helping her family, especially her children.

loans.use: to buy more beauty supplies and nutritionally balanced feed for her small farm animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy several quintals of corn, firewood and beans.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es: Abraham, un hombre humilde y sencillo, tiene 44 años, casado con Alejandrina de 43 años, viven en su casa propia junto a sus 2 queridos hijos, Jilmer y Noemí, quienes son estudiantes. El trabajo que realiza Abraham, es la producción de cacao, esta labor lo realiza junto a su cónyuge, quien le anima para poder seguir adelante y así lograr un ingreso para su familia. Abraham tiene conocimiento sobre el cultivo porque lleva trabajando 15 años en el campo. Le gusta el trabajo que realiza, porque tiene un gran apoyo por parte de su esposa e hijos, quienes día a día están orgullosos, de esa manera logra solventar los gastos que tienen en su hogar y cree que lo más difícil es llevar sus cultivos hasta el lugar donde los vende ya que son sacos que tienen demasiado peso. Este es el décimo sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar puntual y esta contento porque una vez más contará con la ayuda de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará fertilizantes para hacer de sus tierras más productivas.
texts.en:
Abraham is a humble, unassuming, 44-year-old man.  He’s married to Alejandrina, 43, and they live in their own house with their two beloved children, Jilmer and Noemí, who are students.  

Abraham is a cocoa bean farmer.  He does his work together with his spouse who encourages him to continue forward earning family income.  Abraham is very knowledgeable about farming because he’s been working in the fields for 15 years.  He likes the work he does because his wife and children are very supportive of him; every day they are prouder.  This is the way he covers household expenses.  He feels that the most difficult part of his work is carrying his products to the place where he sells them because the sacks are very heavy.

This is his 6th MFP loan.  He knows that he has to pay punctually and is happy because he will have your support once again.  He will use the requested amount to buy fertilizer to make his fields more productive.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto de 59 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su familia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Alberto desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (ovejas y cerdos), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles  para la compra de más animales de otras especies y su respectivo alimento, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Alberto es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia a pesar de las dificultades de la vida.
texts.en:
Alberto, 59, lives in his own house which only has electricity with his family.  It’s located in Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department.  This zone is noted for farming, animal husbandry and crafts making.

For some years now Alberto has been raising small farm animals (pigs and sheep) to sell.  His corrals are located in his back yard and they are spacious and appropriate.  He feeds the animals with nutritionally balanced feed so that they will reach optimal growth and he can sell them in various local markets obtaining good profits to cover family expenses.

He’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more animals of different species and their respective feed.  Profits from the animal sales will be used to repay the loan and to have a better quality of life.  Alberto is a person who has known how to move his family forward through much effort and dedication to overcome life’s difficulties.

loans.use: to buy different species of animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Juan Manuel le esta haciendo falta los acabados del exterior y terminar las escalera para la segunda planta.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar el material que es (cemento, arena, pintura especial para el exterior de las vivienda y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora) ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora antes de que empiece el invierno y así proteger a su familia de enfermedades. 
Don Juan Manuel planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como chofer de un camión de carga, su esposa la señora Magdalena se encarga del cuidado y atención de sus dos hijos que estén bien en los estudios. 
Desea mejorar el patrimonio de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel’s house still needs exterior finishing touches and to finish building the stairway to the second story.  He asks for a loan to buy building materials and supplies (cement, sand, special exterior paint for the house and to pay the person who will do the work) since at present he does not have the needed funds to carry out the work before winter starts and to keep his family safe from diseases.

Juan Manuel plans to repay the loan with the salary he earns as a truck driver.  His wife, Magdalena, cares for their two children who are doing well in school.  He wants to improve the family’s assets.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Fanny Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Fanny continua trabajando en su cyber, pues la demanda es cada dia mejor, ha venido mejorando el local para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Cuenta siempre con el apoyo economico de su esposo, de sus dos hija una ya culmino sus estudios y esta laborando, y la otra sigue estudiando.
Fanny con el credito anterior logro cambiar otro sistema de internet con mas velocidad, siendo la infornacion  mas eficaz, vendiendo mas horas a sus clientes.
este nuevo financiamiento comprara una encolochadora para ofrecer el servicio completo de  trabajo. y la reparacion de equipo que tiene malo, para dar una buena atencion en su negocio. Ya que con el credito anterior
texts.en:
Fanny continues to work at her internet cafe.  Since the demand increases every day, she has begun improving the store to give her customers better service.  She always counts on the financial support of her husband.  One of her daughters has finished her studies and is working, and the other is continuing her studies.  

With her last loan, Fanny was able to change to a different internet system with more speed which delivers information more efficiently, so she can sell more hours to her customers.

With this new loan, she will purchase a copier to offer complete office services, and she will repair equipment with problems to give attention to her business, as with her past loan.

loans.use: to purchase a copier to be able to offer complete services to her customers and repair equipment.

loans.name: Mykola

texts.en: Mykola is married with one child. He and his wife Lesya have a business selling bicycles. Mykola loves this business because he himself loves to ride. Their son who is four already has his own bicycle. Mykola would like to borrow 8,000 UAH to increase his bicycle inventory. His dream is to start a bicycle club in their small town to introduce more people to a healthy and fun activity.

loans.use: to purchase bicycle parts and accessories.

loans.name: Glem Americo

texts.es:
Glem casado, su hijo estudiante, trabajador, de profesión ingeniero, junto a su compañera de vida tiene un negocio en el cual tiene planes de ampliarlo e ingresar mayores cantidades y variedad de productos. Su negocio se basa en la venta de comida siendo el principal factor de comercialización. Inicio su negocio en pequeñas cantidades y de la idea de vender tacos leoneses. El negocio está establecido desde hace un tiempo siendo rentable. Es su primer ciclo de préstamo el cual requiere para realizar mejoras en el local del negocio. 
Con el préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, azulejos, láminas de zinc, cielo rasó, pinturas,  bloques entre otros. Ya que remodelara la cocina del restaurante, le pondrá cielo rasó, cambiara algunas paleta de ventana, lo pintara. Dándole mejor presentación y mayor comodidad a los clientes que lo visita. Agradece a ala financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Glem is married, his son’s a student.  He’s hardworking and is an Engineer by profession.  He has a business together with his life partner that he’d like to expand and add larger amounts and variety of products.  His business is based on food sales, the main products he sells.  He started the business with small amounts and the idea to sell León-style tacos.  The business has been in operation for some time now and it’s been profitable.  This is his first loan cycle and he wants to use the loan to make some improvements to the business’ locale.

He will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies like: cement, sand, tile, metal sheeting, ceiling panels, paint and concrete blocks, among others because he will remodel the locale’s kitchen, install a ceiling, replace window hinges and paint to give it a better appearance and more comfort to the customers who come by.  He thanks the financial institution for the support for his business’ development and to his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Dionisio, es un hombre trabajador D. 39 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su querida esposa Maria D. 40 años y sus 3 hijos Abner, Yesenia y Deyvis, quienes día a día lo motivan a seguir adelante. El cultivo D. cacao, es la actividad que diariamente realiza Dionisio, durante 15 años lleva trabajando en sus tierras, ya que son muy productivas para la siembra D. cacao. Es así que cada mañana se levanta con entusiasmo e ir a sus tierras para poder sacar una siembra D. buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es que gracias al buen producto que obtiene pueD. velar por el bienestar D. su familia y considera que lo más difícil es no poder tener suficiente economía para contratar a los peones para la cosecha del producto. En adelante piensa comprar más plantas D. cacao y así producir más. Este es el décimo sexto crédito que obtiene D. MFP, ha sido muy puntual con sus pagos. En su banco comunal es muy querido por sus compañeros ya que es muy activo y responsable. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles solicitados, piensa comprar más plantas D. cacao para asegurar sus futuras cosechas.
texts.en:
Dionisio is a hardworking, 39-year-old man living in his own house with his beloved wife, María, 40, and their three children, Abner, Yesenia and Deyvis who motivate him daily to continue forward.  

The activity that Dionisio carries out daily is cocoa bean farming.  He’s been working his fields for 15 years because they are very productive for cocoa beans.  He rises every morning with enthusiasm to go to his fields and produce good crops.  What he most enjoys about his work is that thanks to the good crops he obtains he’s able to watch over his family’s wellbeing.  He considers the most difficult part of the work not having enough funds to hire day workers to harvest his beans.  In the future, he plans to buy more cocoa bean plants to produce more.

This is the 6th MFP loan he’s gotten; he has been very punctual with his repayments.  He is very well liked by his fellow communal bank members because he’s very active and responsible.  He will use the requested 3000 new soles to buy more cocoa bean plants to assure future harvests.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa bean plants.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es: La señora María, tiene 34 años, es residente de la comunidad de Las Flores, Naco, Santa Barbara, Su familia la integran 3 hijos,el mayor tiene 19 años, la siguiente niña de 14 años y el menor tiene 10 años, su esposo labora como jornalero en la extracción de arena y grava. Inicio su negocio hace un año y medio aproximadamente, en el cual ha logrado establecer una pulpería donde vende artículos de la canasta básica familiar, productos de aseo, golosinas y refrescos. Con la obtención de su primer crédito piensa surtir más su negocio lo cual le permitirá aumentar las ventas y mejorar sus ingresos familiares y lograr un desarrollo económico.
texts.en:
María, age 34, lives in the Las Flores de Naco community in the Santa Barbara department.  There are three children in her family.  The oldest is 19 years old, the middle child is a 14 year old daughter, and the youngest son is 10 years old.  Her husband is a day laborer, and he extracts sand and gravel.

She started her business approximately a year and a half ago.  She sells basic foodstuffs for the family, cleaning products, sweets, and soft drinks.

Upon getting her first loan she plans to stock her business more.  This will allow her to increase sales and improve the family income.  That way she will achieve financial growth.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store with food like basic grains, dairy products, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
Esteban, es un hombre alegre, entusiasta de 48 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su amada esposa Esedora, de 42 años y junto a ellos viven sus 05 queridos hijos, quienes son el motivo de seguir adelante.
Esteban, junto a su esposa se esmeran día a día por poder sobresalir, se dedican al cultivo de plantas como: café y cacao. Él tiene conocimiento de esta labor porque lleva trabajando 30 años durante su vida, lo cual le agrada porque gracias a ello puede resolver en los gastos de su familia y sobre todo en la educación de sus hijos. Lo más difícil, es tener que  cuidar sus cultivos de la plaga de insectos que pueden afectar su cosecha; pero aun así, él se esfuerza por dar todo de su parte y seguir haciendo trabajar sus terrenos para así obtener productos de calidad. Este será su 17avo crédito solicitado con MFP y por ello se siente muy contento de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de ustedes. En su banco comunal es muy activo y se lleva bien con sus compañeros. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles solicitados, podrá contratar peones que le ayuden a sacar la maleza que crece entre sus plantas para mantener un buen producto.
texts.en:
Esteban is a cheerful, enthusiastic, 48-year-old man living in his own house with his beloved wife, Esedora, 42, and their five beloved children who are his motivation to continue forward.

Esteban and his wife strive daily to be able to succeed.  They farm plants like coffee and cocoa beans.  He knows this occupation well because he’s been doing it during 30 years of his life which pleases him because thanks to it he’s able to cover family expenses and, above all, provide education for his children.

The most difficult thing is having to protect his crops from insect infestations that can affect the crop yield but, even so, he strives to give everything he can to continue to make his fields productive and grow quality products.

This will be his 17th MFP loan and he feels very happy to know that he will get support from you once again.  He is very active in his communal bank and he gets along well with his fellow members.  He will use the requested 1000 new soles to hire day workers to help him remove the weeds that grow between his plants to maintain a good product.

loans.use: to hire day workers.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es: Eulalia tiene 50 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Juan de 60 años y sus tres queridos hijos quienes son el motivo de su felicidad y todos sus esfuerzos. Eulalia, es una mujer que trabaja arduamente  en sus campos de cultivo donde siembra: cacao y café; productos que siembra durante 19 años, que junto a su querido esposo e hijos, le dan aliento para seguir adelante. A ella le gusta que su familia siempre está apoyándole en la cosecha que realiza, pero lo más difícil, es tener que cuidar sus cultivos de la plaga de insectos que pueden afectar la cosecha, ya que con la ganancia que obtiene puede solventar a su familia. Solicita el crédito  para poder ampliar su casa, razón por la cual acude a los crédito que MFP para comprar materiales de construcción. Por tanto será su 17avo crédito, siente que éste dinero le ayudará mucho en el desarrollo de su actividad. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles solicitados comprará materiales de construcción como: cemento, fierros, clavos y  entre otros.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 50 years old and lives in her own house with her husband, Juan, 60, and their three beloved children who are the source of her happiness and the motivation for all her efforts.

Eulalia is a woman who works hard in the fields where she grows cocoa beans and coffee, products she’s been farming for the last 19 years alongside her beloved husband and children who motivate her to continue forward.

She likes that her family always supports her in her farming tasks but the most difficult thing is having to protect her plants from insect infestations that can affect crop yields because profits from it can be used to cover family expenses.

She is asking for a loan to enlarge her house so is calling on MFP for funds to buy building materials and supplies.  This will be her 17th loan.  She feels that the money will help her quite a bit to develop her activity.  She will use the requested 2500 new soles to buy building materials and supplies like: cement, iron rods and nails, among others.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron rods and nails.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 48 años D. edad, es casada y vive con su hija D. diez años.

Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, es propietaria D. una tienda desD. hace ocho años. Su mamá se dedicaba a la panificación y al comercio y fue ella quien le enseño la actividad del comercio. A pesar D. que la señora Maria tiene un titulo universitario D. maestra, ella se dedica a atender su tienda, porque conoce bien el negocio.

Ella debe viajar cada ocho días a la ciudad, en busca D. los productos que venD. en su tienda, el viaje dura unos treinta minutos en autobús.

La señora Maria solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para surtir su tienda y D. esta manera satisfacer las necesidades D. los clientes y los productos que ellos demandan, ya que actualmente hay productos que los clientes buscan y ella no los tiene disponibles. 

Por lo que ella necesita el préstamo, para tener disponible lo que los clientes buscan, D. esta manera podrá obtener mejores ingresos que le permitan ayudar a su hija proporcionándole la educación, ya que ella desea que su hija sea una profesional como ella y así podrá también darle mejores condiciones D. vida a su familia.

Lo que más desea la señora Maria, es el tener bien surtida la tienda y realizarle a su casa mejoras como el  reparar el techo D. su casa, por que la duralita(material del que esta hecho el techo) esta podrido.
texts.en:
María, 48, is married and lives with her 10-year-old daughter.  She is a very hardworking woman.  She has owned a store for the last 8 years.  Her mother was a baker and a merchant and she was the one who taught her about commerce.  Despite María’s having a university degree as a Teacher, she tends to her store because she knows the business well.  She must travel to the city each week searching for the products she sells in her store.  The trip takes about 30 minutes by bus.

María is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to stock her store with the products her customers want and meet customer demand; at present, there are products the customers are asking for and she does not have them in stock.

She needs the loan, therefore, to have what her customers want on hand so that she can earn better income to proviD. her daughter with an education since she wants her daughter to become a professional like her and also be able to proviD. her family with better living conditions.

What María wants the most is to have the store well stocked and to do some home repairs, like repairing the roof because the duralite (material the roof is maD. of) is deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Berkis' Group

texts.es:
Berkis es L. coordinadora del Grupo Mujeres en victoria 1 & 2. Este grupo está compuesto por 10 mujeres y hombres empresarios dedicados a las ventas D. ropas, zapatos, cosméticos, entre otros, algunos D. modo ambulante y algunos tienen sus negocios en sus casas. Berkis lleva 13 años con su negocio, el cual es una cafetería, donD. venD. snack o refrigerios, refrescos y comidas rápidas como sandwiches. Inicio este negocio con un préstamo que tomo, y desD. entonces se ha mantenido primero reinvirtiendo siempre parte D. sus ganancias, y desD. hace unos 3 años invirtiéndole los prestamos que toma en Esperanza Internacional, siendo este su séptimo préstamo. 


Berkis invertira este prestamos en L. compra D.  refrigerios, refrescos, pan, jamon, queso, entre otros. Con L. reinversion D. sus ganancias, y otros prestamos, espera poder tener un negocio estable, con buenos ingresos, que le ayuD. a comprar un solar y construir su casa, y despues descansar mas y trabajar menos. Berkis es madre D. 3 hijos, D. los cuales dos viven con elL..
texts.en:
Berkis is the coordinator of Grupo Mujeres en Victoria 1 & 2, a group of 10 businessmen and women who sell clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and other things.  Some sell on foot and some have their businesses in their homes.

Berkis has had her business for 13 years, a cafeteria where she sells snacks, soft drinks, and fast foods like sandwiches.  She started this business with a loan she got, and since then she has supported herself, first always reinvesting part of her profits, and for three years, investing in her business the loans she got from Esperanza Internacional.  This is her seventh loan.

Berkis will use this loan to buy snacks, soft drinks, bread, ham, cheese, and other things.  With the reinvestment of her profits and with other loans, she hopes to be able to have a stable business with good earnings that help her buy a piece of land and build her house, and, later, rest more and work less.

Berkis is the mother of three children, two of whom live with her.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, bread, ham, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario tiene 31 años, es un hombre sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Feliciana de 30 años y fruto de ese amor tienen dos hijos Nelida y Marilyn, por quienes anhela dar una mejor calidad de vida. Hace 20 años, Mario, lleva dedicándose a la agricultura  quien se hizo conocedor de los cultivos que produce como: cacao y yuca; desde entonces se levanta muy temprano para poder ver sus tierras y las necesidades que puedan tener sus cultivos y obtener productos de calidad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que gracias a las buenas cosechas que produce y el negocio que tiene puede solventar con los gastos de su familia. Por otro lado cuenta con un negocio de venta de abarrotes y siendo muy compicado tener capital para abastecer su tienda. Pero aún así Mario no pierde las esperanzas de seguir adelante y poder dar lo mejor a su familia. Este es su 12avo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual al pagar, para que pueda acceder a otro préstamo. En su banco comunal es participe en todas las reuniones que se realiza. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para su negocio como: arroz, azúcar, conservas, detergentes, entre otros.
texts.en:
Mario is 31, and is a modest hard-working man.  He lives in his own house with his wife Feliciana, who is 30. They have two children, Nelida and Marilyn, to whom they long to give a better quality of life. Mario has farmed for 20 years, and has become an expert on the crops that he produces, such as cacao and yucca.

During all that time he has gotten up very early to look over his land and the needs that his crops may have, in order to obtain quality produce. What he likes about his work, is that thanks to the good harvests that he produces and the business that he has, he can cover his family's expenses. 

Furthermore, he has a business selling groceries, and it has been very difficult to get working capita to stock his store. But even so, Mario isn't losing hope of moving forward, and being able to give the best to his family.

This is his 12th loan with MFP. He knows that he has to make his payments on time, in order to access another loan.  He participates in all the meetings of his communal bank.  With the 3,000 nuevos soles he is applying for, he will buy more products for his business, such as rice, sugar, preserves, detergents, and other things.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, preserves, and detergents to stock his store.

loans.name: Francisco Berti

texts.es:
Francisco de 65 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo luz, ubicada en el distrito de Paijan que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona es agrícola y  ganadera.

Francisco se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, actividad que viene realizando desde hace varios años, cuenta con su bicicleta donde reparte el pan que prepara a las diferentes tiendas de la zona donde vive y también ofrece algunos dulces a sus clientes,  tiene su propia clientela, últimamente su negocio a ido creciendo y han aumentado sus clientes, lo que le permite tener mayores ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su casa.  

Para seguir realizando sus actividades como hasta el momento a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y para la construcción de un horno artesanal, con la intensión de seguir elaborando pan, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y tener un poco más de comodidades para su hogar.  Francisco y su esposa han sabido salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, con la finalidad de alcanzar lo que se han propuesto para su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco, 65, lives with his family in his own house which has only electricity. It is located in the Paijan district which belongs to the La Libertad department. This is a farming and ranching region. 
Francisco makes his living by making and selling bread, which he has been doing for several years. He has a bicycle which he uses to distribute the bread he prepares to different stores in the area where he lives; he also offers some sweets to his customers. He has his own clientele. Lately his business has grown and the number of customers has increased, which permits him to have greater income to cover the daily necessities of his household. In order to continue his business as it has been going up until now, he believed it necessary to request a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase ingredients and to construct an artisanal stove. His intention is to continue making bread so that with the proceeds he will be able to repay the loan and have a few more comforts for his home. Francisco and his wife have known how to improve their lives through a great deal of effort and hard work, with the goal of achieving what they have proposed for their family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and to construct an artisanal stove to continue baking bread.

loans.name: Marvin Jose

texts.es:
Don Marvin, sigue invirtiendo en su pulperia, hoy en dia, tiene poca mercaderia, lo que con su financiamiento anterior logro invirtir en la construccion de un cuarto. Lo que logro, mejor comodidad para su familia.

Con este nuevo financiamiento podra comprar productos para la pulperia, ya que tiene poco inventario, y que necesita seguir manteniendo su clientela. Productos a comprar: granos basico, productos lacteos, gaseosa, golosinas, cereales entre otros como, zepol, panadol,  acetaminofen, dolofin. Siendo lo mas consumido por su clientela y que son de venta libre para el cliente.
texts.en:
Marvin continues to invest in his small grocery store.  At the moment he has very little merchandise.  With his last loan he was able to invest in the construction of a room, which afforded his family more comfort.

With this new loan he will be able to buy products for his small grocery store since he has little inventory and he needs to keep his clientele.  He will buy the following products: staple grains, dairy products, soft drinks, candy, and cereal, as well as other things such as Zepol, Panadol, acetaminophen, and Dolofin.  These are what his customers buy most.

loans.use: to invest in products for his small grocery store since he has little inventory and he needs to maintain his sales.

loans.name: Milagros Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milagros de 23 años, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.   Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Milagros se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que a colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos un año, su mercadería lo ofrece en su casa a sus clientes, también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos personales.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de ropa y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito, mejorar su calidad de vida y para seguir apoyando económicamente a sus padres.
texts.en:
Milagros, age 23, is single and lives with her parents’ house.  The house has no basic services.  It is located in the rural zone of the Olmos district, which is in the Lambayeque department.  The zone is known for its agriculture and its livestock.

Milagros sells clothes.  The business has been located in her home for one year.  She offers her merchandise to her customers in her home.  She also takes orders, trying to have greater customer demand.  That way she will be able to get more income to pay for her personal expenses.

Upon observing that her business is more prosperous every day, she believed she needed to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy a greater quantity of clothes and to stock her store with innovative products.  She will do this so that she continues to get more customers in order to pay for her loan, improve her quality of life, and to continue financially supporting her parents.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of clothes and to stock her store with innovative products.

loans.name: Sandra Elena

texts.es:
Doña Sandra, siempre activa en su trabajo como conserje, pues para ella la mejora de su vivienda ha sido su proposito por el, ha venido haciendo mejoras y poder dar a sus hijos un mejor techo. De sus tres hijos,  el mayor esta trabajando y apoya con los gastos.
Con su credito anterior logro hacer el baño, logrando mejor higiene. Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento podra comenzar el muro, siendo de gran beneficio, y que por ser grande, ira poco a poco construyendo debido a su disponibilidad de ingreso, ya que tiene que cubrir otros gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Sandra is always active in her work as a janitor. For her, the improvement of her house has been her goal. She has been making improvements and has been able to give her children a better roof. Of her three children, the oldest is working, and he helps with the expenses. With her last loan, she was able to do the bathroom, achieving better hygiene. Now, with this new financing, she will be able to start the wall, which will be of great benefit. Because it is big, she will build it bit by bit as the money is available, since she has to cover other household expenses.

loans.use: to build a wall for more security for her family

loans.name: Nilton

texts.es: Nilton, de 32 años, convive con Maribel de 28 años, viven juntos en casa propia junto a sus dos queridas hijas Katy y Nelly, quienes son el motivo de su esfuerzo. Nilton, un hombre que se esmera por dar lo mejor a su familia, se ocupa haciendo movilidad en los anexos de la ciudad de San Francisco, lleva trabajando 05 años con lo cual logra dar el sustento a su familia. A diario sale muy temprano de su casa para que pueda captar pasajeros ya que hay mucha competencia con los compañeros de trabajo. A Nilton, le gusta su trabajo porque perennemente esta transitando en diferentes anexos de la ciudad de San Francisco y considera que lo más difícil es cuando hay días que no transitan pasajeros ya que es la necesidad de llevar un sustento a su vivienda. Pero aún así Nilton, esta dispuesto a seguir adelante ya que es la única forma de poder solventar a su familia. Su plan a futuro es en mejorar la construcción de su casa para así ofrecer seguridad a su familia. Este será su sexto crédito con MFP y espera ser muy puntual en sus cuotas, puesto que no quiere darle problemas a su banco comunal, en lo cual se siente muy agradecido. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles solicitados, podrá comprar materiales de construcción como: cemento, fierros.
texts.en:
Nilton, age 32, lives with 28 year old Maribel.  They live together in their own home with their two beloved daughters, Katy and Nelly.  The children are the motivation for their efforts.

Nilton is a man who tries very hard to give his family the best.  He works providing transportation in the annexes of the city of San Francisco.  He has been working five years, and with his work he has managed to support his family.  He leaves his house very early every day in order to be able to get passengers.  There is a lot of competition with his work colleagues.

Nilton likes his work because he is always traveling to different annexes of the city of San Francisco.  He feels that the days when he does not have passengers is the hardest part.  This is because he needs to have passengers in order to support his household.  However, Nilton is still prepared to get ahead because this is the only way to be able to support his family.  His plan for the future is to improve the construction of his house in order to give his family more security.  

This will be his sixth loan with MFP, and he plans to be very punctual with his payments.  He does not want to cause any problems for his communal bank, in which he feels very grateful.  He will use the 3,000 requested soles to buy construction materials like cement and iron.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Oscas

texts.es: Oscas tiene 20 años, es un joven soltero, alegre y entusiasta que desea salir adelante. Vive en casa de sus padres quienes lo ayudan para seguir estudiando. Él se esmera por seguir adelante; pero también tiene que trabajar en la chacra de sus padres para poder solucionar con sus gastos educativos. Hace 10 años que ayuda a sus padres en los cultivos de su terreno como: cacao y café. Lo que más le gusta es ir a sus tierras a trabajar saber que desde ya esta siendo conocedor de las plantas y con la ayuda de su cultivo puede educarse tranquilo y considera que lo más difícil es que a veces tiene que estudiar y trabajar a la vez, pero aún así no pierde las esperanzas de continuar adelante. Con el crédito solicitado podrá solucionar los gastos de estudio y seguir adelante con arduo empeño. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, pues sabe que este dinero le será muy beneficioso para su futuro. Se siente contento por pertenecer al grupo de socios de su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá pagar sus estudios.
texts.en: Oscas is 20 years old.  He is a single, upbeat, and enthusiastic young man who wants to get ahead.  He lives at home with his parents, who help him so that he can keep studying.  He puts a lot of effort into getting ahead, but he also has to work at his parents' small farm to be able to cover his educational expenses.  He has been helping his parents with their crops of cacao and coffee for 10 years now.  What he likes most is going to their fields to work knowing that he is becoming very knowledgeable about the plants and that with the help of their crops he can get an education without stress.  What he finds most difficult is that sometimes he has to study and work at the same time, but even so he does not lose hope of moving forward.  With this loan he will be able to pay for his educational expenses and move forward with rigorous determination.  This will be his first loan with MFP and he knows this money will benefit his future greatly.  He is happy to belong to his communal bank's group of members.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles he will be able to pay his educational expenses.

loans.use: to pay for his educational expenses

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabrics and wood

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio tiene 40 años, es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Celedonia de 37 años y sus dos menores hijos Jaime y Yorela a quienes desea brindar mejor calidad de vida. Desde muy joven, Antonio se dedica al cultivo de cacao y café, es conocedor de la agricultura, sus cultivos están bien cuidados ya que sabe que los ingresos de su familia dependen de esta actividad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo con ánimo para obtener buena cosecha. Lleva 30 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que fumigar sus cultivos para evitar la plaga de insectos que perjudican sus plantas. Con el tiempo, desea abrir un negocio y comprar más plantas de cacao para que pueda aumentar su producción. Este será su décimo sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que con este aporte le ayudará en el progreso de su negocio. Antonio se siente muy contento por trabajar en su banco comunal, él sabe que debe ser responsable con los pagos. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará plantas de cacao y productos de abarrotes como: azúcar, arroz, conservas, etc. Para su nuevo negocio.
texts.en: Antonio is 40 years old. He is a very hard-working man. He lives in his own house with his wife Celedonia, 37 years old, and their two minor children, Jaime and Yorela, to whom he wants to bring a better quality of life. From the time he was very young, Antonio has grown cacao and coffee. He is knowledgeable about agriculture, and his crops are well-cared for, since he knows that his family's income depends on this activity. What he likes most about his job is planting the fields. He does it with great effort, and above all with spirit, in order to get a good harvest. He has been doing this for 30 years, and he thinks the most difficult thing is to have to fumigate his crops to avoid plagues of insects that damage his plants. With time, he wants to open a business and buy more cacao plants in order to increase his production. This will be his sixteenth loan with MFP. He knows that this support will help him in the progress of his business. Antonio feels very happy because he works in his communal bank, and he knows he must be responsible with the payments. With the 3,000 nuevos soles he is asking for, he will purchase cacao plants and grocery items such as sugar, rice, preserves, etc., for his new business.

loans.use: to purchase cacao plants, as well as to purchase products to start his new store

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos de 35 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Morropón que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería.

Carlos desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (ovejas, cabras y cerdos), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento ideal para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles  para la compra de más animales y su respectivo alimento, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Carlos es una persona que con esfuerzo, trabajo y empeño a sabido sacar a su familia adelante a pesar de las dificultades que se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 35, single, and lives in his parents' house, which has basic services. It is located in the rural area of Morropón district, which belongs to Piura department. People in this area make their living from farming and livestock-raising. 

For several years, Carlos has been raising and selling farmyard animals (sheep, goats, and pigs). His pens are located behind his house, and are large and suitable for this purpose. He provides them with balanced animal feed and natural grazing, so that his animals attain their maximum growth. This is so he can sell them in the different markets in the area, and obtain good earnings to cover his personal expenses.  

He has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to buy more animals and their respective feed.  With earnings that he gets by selling his animals, he will be able to pay back his loan and have a better quality of life. 

Carlos is a person who with effort, hard work and determination has managed to help his family get ahead, in spite of the difficulties that have arisen in his life.

loans.use: To buy more farmyard animals, and their respective feed.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia,  no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito La Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Alberto se dedica a la venta de harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú), esta actividad los realiza desde hace 5 años, negocio que a colocado en su domicilio. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de harina de maíz para la preparación de chicha de jora en la zona donde vive, cuenta con su clientela, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Teniendo la oportunidad de que su negocio crezca Alberto a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1300 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y para que su familia se supere poco a poco.
texts.en:
Alberto is 53, and lives with his wife and children in their own house, which doesn't have basic services. It is located in the rural area of La Matanza district, which is part of Piura department. Throughout this area, the people make their living from farming, livestock-raising, and handicrafts. 

Albert sells corn meal for making chicha de jora (this is a delicious beverage made from corn, that is very popular in northern Peru). He has been in this business for five years, and runs it out of his home.  

Lately, his sales of corn meal for making chicha de jora have increased in the area where he lives. He has his clientele, which has helped him to increase his income and improve his family's quality of life.

Because he has the opportunity to see his business grow, Alberto has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,300 nuevos soles, to buy a larger quantity of corn meal for making chicha de jora. His aim is to obtain greater profits, and increase his clientele, in order to pay back the loan granted, and so that his family can get ahead, little by little.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of corn meal for making chicha de jora (corn beer), and to continue selling to his customers.

loans.name: Anallely

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Anallely le está haciendo falta la losa en el patio trasero.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder comprar el material que es (arena, cemento y varilla) ya que su esposo se encargara de realizar la mejorar en horario adicional a su empleo. 
Doña Anallely es quien se encarga del cuidado y atención de la familia, quien se encargas de los gastos y de pagar el crédito será su esposo el señor  Brayan Jesus con el sueldo que recibe de su empleo en una agencia aduanal. 
Desean mejorar la calidad de vida de su pequeña hija y que tenga un patrimonio seguro.
texts.en:
Anallely's home needs a concrete slab in the rear patio area.  She is applying for a loan to buy materials (sand, cement, rebar), since her husband will look after carrying out the improvements, in his spare time outside of work. 

Anallely is the one who looks after and cares for the family. Her husband Brayan Jesús will be the one responsible for the expenditures and paying back the loan, with the salary that he receives from his job in a customs brokerage.
